question: You would like to invite your friend from abroad to a public event in your country. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter:Invite him/her to the eventExplain why you think he/she would like the eventTell him/her about the other activities you can do
text: How have you been since we last met?
I’m writing to invite you to join the important holiday in my country Vietnam, called the Tet holiday on 2nd January, 2023.

Asian people usually celebrate the new year based on the Lunar calendar, we have a bunch of things to do on that holiday such as house decorations, exchange red envelop and cooking traditional Vietnamese food including square rice cake which is your favourite food. In addition, during that holiday, Vietnamese usually wear Ao Dai which I gave you on your 22nd birthday last year, if I remember exactly, you were so excited wearing our traditional cloth.

Other than these activities, lion dance is one of the crucial activities for celebrating the new year, for local people it is a good way to bring luck to their future. Luckily, the lion dance festival will be back, after two years of cancelling due to the pandemic, they can show the members how to dance properly and perform as a lion. I believe you will have a lot of fun at the festival.
Hope to hear back from you soon.
